documentation.text:
@notice Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool
 @param _pid index of pool

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

params._foreignAccount: the cross chain wallet that initiated this call, if applicable.
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._vaultEnteredAt: date that the vault was entered at
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

getTimeMultiplier(uint256).details: For Zorro staking vault, returns 1e12 no matter what

params.durationInWeeks: number of weeks committed into Vault

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._isActive: Whether it shall be active. If false, timemultiplier will be 1.

params._priceFeedLPPoolOtherToken: The address of the price feed for the counterparty token in the ZOR LP Pool
params._priceFeedZOR: The address of the price feed for ZOR

setRewardsParams(uint256,uint256[],uint2.details: NOTE: Must enter all parameters or existing ones will be overwritten!

params._baseRewardRateBasisPoints: Base reward rate factor, in bp
params._blocksPerDay: # of blocks per day for this chain
params._chainMultiplier: Rewards multiplier factor to be applied to this chain

params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: Percent of market desired to be captured, in bp. 333 = 3.33%. ONLY to be set on the home chain

params._chainId: The ind of the chain that this contract is on
params._homeChainId: The chain ID of the home chain
params._homeChainZorroController: The address of the home chain controller

params._zorroControllerOracle: Address of Chainlink oracle that can interact with this contract

params._zorroLPPool: Address of the Zorro-X LP pool
params._zorroLPPoolOtherToken: Address of the counterpart token to the ZOR token in the LP Pool

setZorroPerBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Values to be provided by Oracle. Perferable to run daily

params._ZorroTotalVaultTVLUSD: USD value of all TVL locked into the Zorro protocol, across all chains
params._publicPoolZORBalance: Number of ZOR tokens remaining in public pool on home chain
params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: % desired capture of total market TVL, measured in basis points
params._totalChainMultipliers: Sum total of all chain multipliers for each chain
params._totalMarketTVLUSD: Total DeFi market TVL across all chains (measured in USD)

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.mintedZOR: Amount of ZOR rewards minted (useful for cross chain)

params._harvestOnly: If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into

params._foreignAccount: address of wallet cross-chain (that originally made this deposit)
params._harvestOnly: If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into

returns._mintedZORRewards: Amount of ZOR rewards minted (to be burned XChain)
returns._rewardsDueXChain: Amount of ZOR rewards due to the origin (cross chain) user
returns._slashedRewardsXChain: Amount of ZOR rewards to be slashed (and thus rewarded to ZOR stakers)

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

depositFullServiceFromXChain(uint256,add.notice: Full service deposit function to be called by ZorroControllerXChain only.

getTimeMultiplier(uint256).notice: Calculate time multiplier based on duration committed

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

setRewardsParams(uint256,uint256[],uint2.notice: Setter: Reward params (See Tokenomics paper for more details)

setUSDCToZORPath(address[]).notice: Setter: Set path for token swap from USDC to ZOR

setUSDCToZorroLPPoolOtherTokenPath(addre.notice: Setter: Set path for token swap from USDC to counterparty token in ZOR LP pool

setZorroContracts(address,address).notice: Setter: Set key ZOR contract addresses

setZorroPerBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Set the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault (works on-chain only)

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Fully withdraw Want tokens from underlying Vault.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,bo.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC

withdrawalFullServiceFromXChain(address,.notice: Full service withdrawal to be called from authorized cross chain endpoint
